trans-unit.source: Provides panels on each side of the form and a central panel that can hold one or more controls.
trans-unit.target: 每一邊的表單，並可以保存一個或多個控制項的中央面板提供面板。

trans-unit.source: ToolStripContainer is similar to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.
trans-unit.target: ToolStripContainer 是類似於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>

trans-unit.source: It uses four docked side panels (instances of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>) and one central panel (an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>) to create a typical arrangement.
trans-unit.target: 它會使用四個停駐的側邊面板 (的執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>) 和一個中央面板 (執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>) 來建立一般的排列方式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>

trans-unit.source: You cannot remove the side panels, but you can hide them by setting their respective <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.TopToolStripPanelVisible%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.BottomToolStripPanelVisible%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.LeftToolStripPanelVisible%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.RightToolStripPanelVisible%2A> properties to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 您無法移除側邊面板中，但您可以設定其各自隱藏<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.TopToolStripPanelVisible%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.BottomToolStripPanelVisible%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.LeftToolStripPanelVisible%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.RightToolStripPanelVisible%2A>屬性`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.RightToolStripPanelVisible%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.LeftToolStripPanelVisible%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.BottomToolStripPanelVisible%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.TopToolStripPanelVisible%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, each of these properties is `true` at design time.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，每一個屬性是`true`在設計階段。

trans-unit.source: Also at design time, the ToolStripContainer appears with its top panel already expanded.
trans-unit.target: 也在設計階段 ToolStripContainer 會顯示已展開其上方面板。

trans-unit.source: You can neither remove nor hide the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 您不可以移除或隱藏<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>

trans-unit.source: You can arrange one or more <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controls in the side panels, and you can use the central panel for other controls.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用一或多個排列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>側邊面板中，而且您的控制項可用於其他控制項的中央面板。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel> also provides a way to get renderer support into the body of your form for a consistent appearance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>也可用來取得轉譯器支援為一致的外觀的表單的本文。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>

trans-unit.source: ToolStripContainer does not support Multiple Document Interface (MDI) applications.
trans-unit.target: ToolStripContainer 不支援多個文件介面 (MDI) 應用程式。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> for MDI applications.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>MDI 應用程式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>

trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the bottom panel of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得的下方面板<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Use the BottomToolStripPanel property to add <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controls or move them from another <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 使用 BottomToolStripPanel 屬性來新增<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>控制項，或將它們從另一個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>移</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip></xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref> representing the bottom panel of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"> </xref>代表下方面板的<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the bottom panel of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref> is visible.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否下方面板的<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref>為可見。

trans-unit.source: Set the BottomToolStripPanelVisible property to `false` to use a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> without a bottom panel.
trans-unit.target: 將 BottomToolStripPanelVisible 屬性設定為`false`使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>下方面板不。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the bottom panel of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref> is visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果下方面板的<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref>為可見，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the center panel of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得的中央面板<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: You can use the top, bottom, left, and right panels of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> to hold <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controls.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用上方、 底部、 左邊與右邊的面板<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>來保存<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>

trans-unit.source: Controls other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> are automatically added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 除了控制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>會自動新增至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeftChanged"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.SizeChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.SizeChanged"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派事件處理常式叫用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The OnSizeChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnSizeChanged 方法也允許衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是處理衍生類別中的事件的慣用的技巧。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件資料。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.target: 將 RightToolStripPanelVisible 屬性設定為`false`使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>不正確的面板。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the right panel of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref> is visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果的右方面板<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref>為可見，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the top panel of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得上方面板的<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Use the TopToolStripPanel property to add <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controls or move them from another <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 使用 TopToolStripPanel 屬性來新增<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>控制項，或將它們從另一個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>移</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip></xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref> representing the top panel of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"> </xref>代表的上方面板<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the top panel of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref> is visible.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否上方面板的<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref>為可見。

trans-unit.source: Set the TopToolStripPanelVisible property to `false` to use a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> without a top panel.
trans-unit.target: 將 TopToolStripPanelVisible 屬性設定為`false`使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>沒有上方面板。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the top panel of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref> is visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果上方面板的<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref>為可見，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。
